A couple of developments I've stumbled upon recently:

Microsoft .Net based research project providing an API onto GPUs
http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/projects/Accelerator/

Mono 2.2 has support for SIMD instructions (not yet adopted by Microsoft/ECMA):
http://go-mono.com/docs/index.aspx?tlink=0@N%3AMono.Simd


I guess going down the GPU route would tend to leave CPU cores idle if
you have a multi-core CPU. OTOH I've heard GPUs can be far faster at
certain tasks than CPUs, so it it's probably a decision to be made for
each evaluation scheme(where most of the CPU overhead is) based on
which approach works best.

Colin
